item.description:
Hi Workshop Attendees!

It's a been a few weeks and now it's time to show us your favorite images from the Fine Art Nude Workshop from April 4th!

Please bring 5-10 images that you shot during the workshop to show the rest of the group. We'll look them over and critique them....

We are meeting at Jeff's - so please bring a snack or drinks to share. Can't wait to see what you all have done!

Cheers,
Donna

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Fine Art Nude WorkShop Critique Night
